data.title: Casper, The Friendly Ghost
data.text:
Casper, The Friendly Ghost (cartoon)

(Theatrical Cartoons since 1943; Syndicated for TV since 1953 - 1979) [Starting as part of the "Noveltoons" animated cartoons produced by Famous Studios Productions, released by Paramount Pictures from 1943 to 1967; other familiar characters were Raggedy Ann and Andy, Little Audrey and Baby Huey plus a number of cartoons with lesser-known characters; Besides appearances within "Noveltoons", Casper came to TV in a 1953 package offered to TV stations, and something called "Casper And His Friends". In 1979, there was a Hanna-Barbera series "Casper and the Space Angels", and a couple of others.]
